description: Hello! I'm Kirill Tatarinov, a passionate web developer. I've refined my skills in TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, TinaCMS, React, SASS, NodeJS, Prisma, and Figma. I've worked with box.dev and NewMediaAgency in LA, CA, USA.
keywords: Tatarinov Kirill, Front-end Developer, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, TinaCMS, React, SASS, NodeJS, Prisma, Figma, Portfolio
ogDescription: Hello! I'm Kirill Tatarinov, a passionate web developer. I specialize in TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, TinaCMS, React, SASS, NodeJS, Prisma, and Figma. Explore my portfolio to see my work and skills.
